alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Onondaga County through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Liverpool, or near Baldwinsville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Syracuse, Clay, Van Buren, Baldwinsville, North Syracuse, Solvay, Liverpool, New York State Fairgrounds, Galeville and Bayberry. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 36 and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 19 and 28, and near 29 South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
